channel.title: Odd place for shin pain?
channel.description:
So I've decided it's time to do some endurance training. I need to lose about 8kg, and prep for some runs. But the thing is, I have frequent shin pains. I can't run longer then 3 minutes or so. I'm not tired, but it feels like a part of my leg is between a vise. My first guess was muscle cramps, but the odd thing is that it's just above my ankle, and that's where the end of the muscle is. See the attached image, encircled area is where it aches.
It's both legs btw, they start to ache at the same time. So I doubt it's simple cramps. I'm going to see a doctor next week, but I was wondering if you guys had any idea.

sry i can see why people think you’re retarded

[/quote]everything you say is fucking pointlessly retarded, explain WHY you said ‘lolfatty,’ or are you just randomly spewing words out of your ass like you always do…
[/quote]you obviously have no idea as to what the concept of trolling refers to, go get a clue and until then, stay off the interwebz you useless inbred
[/quote]no, don’t use trolling as an excuse, you’re just fucking retarded and really have no point being here

you must be extremely moronic to have been here 4 years and to still lack the adequate skills necessitated to identify posts that were posted for the sole purpose of trolling

no really, i can easily see why everyone hates you

seriously, i’ve seen how you’ve argued with people on these forums and it’s all the same; you reiterate the same bullshit about how they’re moronic and incompetent. guess what, it’s all useless, everyone thinks you’re a waste of life. truth be told, you should have been shot on your mom’s face instead

i guess i’m gonna see another reply from the retard who never gives up, just letting you know before hand, tl;dr. oh, go ahead and try and make up your own reasons as to why i don’t bother reading what you say, maybe i’m clueless, incompetent, lack understanding, etc. . . you’ll think of one, right buddy?

Yeah well you’re shit and you’re worth shit now get the fuck off my topic. Reported fucker. Get the fuck off you’re worth nothing here…

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

I know what it is:

en.wikipedia.org

Herpes simplex

Herpes simplex is a viral disease caused by the herpes simplex virus. Infections are categorized based on the part of the body infected. Oral herpes involves the face or mouth. It may result in small blisters in groups often called cold sores or fever blisters or may just cause a sore throat. Genital herpes, often simply known as herpes, may have minimal symptoms or form blisters that break open and result in small ulcers. These typically heal over two to four weeks. Tingling or sh There are t...
